title: Professional Leadership Development: Self-Reflection-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Over 5 years of practical experience in science fields and foundational leadership competencies
context.additional_context: Supports real-time collaboration and self-reflection journaling environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose practical problems by applying a leadership behavior case analysis framework with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can describe specific stages of leadership competency development in self-reflection journals at least three times per week.
Learners can submit a leadership improvement plan incorporating peer feedback by the completion of the PBL project.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
